addExtraDesc: Extras include items such as syrups, alternative milks, extra shots and more.
addExtraCardTitle: Alternative Milks? Syrups? Add them to your Extras
addExtraCardDesc: “Extras” can include all the items that customers usually ask for on or in their drinks. This includes extra shots, alternative milk, syrups, scoops of ice cream, sprinkles and anything else you’re happy to serve your customers.
name: Name
noExtra: You don't currently have any extras setup for this shop.
sizeDesc: Set the sizes of your drinks along with their corresponding price. You can also set the 'most popular' size and this will be promoted on the item page for users in the app.
whichExtra: Which extras are available with this drink?
